originalText.text: Avenues Daycare has been such a huge help to our lives. I needed a clean, safe, friendly place to bring my 2 month old and Avenues checked every box. I know my daughter is well taken care of and she's having so much fun while I'm at work. They use the Procare app to communicate with parents and I get see to photos and videos of her throughout the day. All the staff are kind and there is clear communication. Most of all I am so appreciative of Avenues working with my schedule and budget to make childcare work for our family. I highly recommend!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Avenues Kids Daycare! My son has been attending Avenue's for 1 1/2 years, and has shown so much progression with his overall development. The staff is amazing and attentive to all the children. Christina and Odalis ensure a productive, healthy routine for my son through out the day, where he can have fun and learn at the same time. My nephew also attended for three years where we can zero complaints. Very kind and trustworthy staff that I'm glad to have build a bond with. I believe this has been the best experience for my son and I! - Cynthia

originalText.text: I toured many daycares in New York before deciding to place my two-year old daughter at Avenue Kids Daycare. I chose this daycare because of how extremely friendly and professional the staff was and continue to be. This daycare is clean, colorful, and has positive energy.  Also they teach the children ABC’s, numbers, shapes, colors, arts and crafts, as well as a second language. I have been with Avenues Kids Daycare for four months. They continue to take such great care of my baby girl. It makes me happy to send her off every morning, knowing she is safe and will be taken care of.

originalText.text: Very professional and clean environment for your children. The owner is nothing short of a sweetheart and will take great care of your child!!! 5 star service..

text.text: Very professional and clean environment for your children. The owner is nothing short of a sweetheart and will take great care of your child!!! 5 star service..

originalText.text: Es un excelente servicio el espacio de los niños hay una limpieza impecable todo muy desinfectado el trato a los niños Es con delicadeza amor y respeto y lo más importante somos muy temerosa De Dios

text.text: It is an excellent service, the children's space is impeccably clean, everything is very disinfected, the treatment of children is done with gentleness, love and respect, and most importantly, we are very God-fearing.
